snippet: The vote would delay rules designed to make it more difficult for businesses like seafood processors to exploit foreign workers and to get more Americans into seasonal jobs.
abstract: Four Democrats on the Senate Appropriations Committee side with Republicans to temporarily block new rules protecting seasonal foreign workers from exploitation by their employers.
lead_paragraph: The vote would delay rules designed to make it more difficult for businesses like seafood processors to exploit foreign workers and to get more Americans into seasonal jobs.

headline.main: Senate Panel Blocks Rules on Seasonal Jobs
headline.print_headline: Senate Panel Blocks Rules On Seasonal Jobs
